  • RHB LISTS FOUR MALAYSIAN STOCKS IN ITS 2023 REGIONAL ESG TOP PICKS

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/655153

    02/14/2023, 15:08

    75.0% Shortened!

    “Press Metal’s PT Bintan Phase 2 is currently 84% completed

    At the noon break on Tuesday, shares in Press Metal were up 12 sen or 2.33% at RM5.27, giving the company a market capitalisation of RM43.42 billion

    RHB analyst Jeffrey Tan projects TIME dotCom to post an ROE of 13.5% for FY2022, and 16% for FY2023, from 12% in FY2021, supported by stronger earnings growth from continued expansion of its fibre footprint, higher utilisation of data centres, and increased cloud offerings demand

    TIME dotCom shares were up one sen or 0.19% at the noon break, valuing the company at RM9.76 billion

    RHB analyst Lee Meng Horng forecast Samaiden to achieve an ROE of 19.9% for FY2023, and 20.7% for FY2024, versus 17.7% in FY2022, driven by higher net margins stemming from a decline in photovoltaic module cost, as well as the group’s earnings growth

    “[Samaiden] is trading at a discount to its Malaysian utility peers at 13 times FY2024 PER versus 14 times,” Lee continued, adding that RHB believes the stock is trading at an undemanding valuation, given the group’s three-year 33.8% earnings CAGR driven by its sturdy order book growth

    ['rhb', 'press', 'metal', 'group', 'time']

    “Press Metal’s PT Bintan Phase 2 is currently 84% completed

    At the noon break on Tuesday, shares in Press Metal were up 12 sen or 2.33% at RM5.27, giving the company a market capitalisation of RM43.42 billion

    RHB analyst Jeffrey Tan projects TIME dotCom to post an ROE of 13.5% for FY2022, and 16% for FY2023, from 12% in FY2021, supported by stronger earnings growth from continued expansion of its fibre footprint, higher utilisation of data centres, and increased cloud offerings demand

    TIME dotCom shares were up one sen or 0.19% at the noon break, valuing the company at RM9.76 billion

    RHB analyst Lee Meng Horng forecast Samaiden to achieve an ROE of 19.9% for FY2023, and 20.7% for FY2024, versus 17.7% in FY2022, driven by higher net margins stemming from a decline in photovoltaic module cost, as well as the group’s earnings growth

    “[Samaiden] is trading at a discount to its Malaysian utility peers at 13 times FY2024 PER versus 14 times,” Lee continued, adding that RHB believes the stock is trading at an undemanding valuation, given the group’s three-year 33.8% earnings CAGR driven by its sturdy order book growth

    ['rhb', 'press', 'metal', 'group', 'time']



  • NO PLANS FOR TARGETED ABOLITION OF PTPTN REPAYMENTS FOR B40 BORROWERS, DEWAN RAKYAT TOLD

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/14/no-plans-for-targeted-abolition-of-ptptn-loans-for-b40-borrowers-dewan-rakyat-told

    02/14/2023, 15:08

    62.5% Shortened!

    Tuesday, 14 Feb 2023

    Wan Ahmad Fayhsal had asked when the government will introduce targeted PTPTN loan abolition for B40 households and the number of borrowers who will benefit from it

    He also noted that the government has allowed loan repayments to be restructured based on the borrowers’ financial capabilities

    Loan repayments also only begin 12 months after the borrowers have completed their higher studies to give them time to earn a stable income,” said Khaled To an additional question whether the government has promised to introduce the targeted abolition since it was previously listed as part of the election manifesto, Khaled said one of the parties under the Unity Government had decided to totally abolish PTPTN loan repayments

    Economy Minister Rafizi Ramli then stood up and wanted to refer Wan Ahmad Fayhsal to the Parliament's Rights and Privileges Committee for trying to mislead the Dewan Rakyat on the issue

    "In this matter, I want to refer Machang to the committee for saying that there was a promise to abolish PTPTN and it was listed part of our election manifesto, that is a lie

    ['ptptn', 'loan', 'repayment', 'borrower', 'say']

    Wan Ahmad Fayhsal had asked when the government will introduce targeted PTPTN loan abolition for B40 households and the number of borrowers who will benefit from it

    He also noted that the government has allowed loan repayments to be restructured based on the borrowers’ financial capabilities

    Loan repayments also only begin 12 months after the borrowers have completed their higher studies to give them time to earn a stable income,” said Khaled To an additional question whether the government has promised to introduce the targeted abolition since it was previously listed as part of the election manifesto, Khaled said one of the parties under the Unity Government had decided to totally abolish PTPTN loan repayments

    Economy Minister Rafizi Ramli then stood up and wanted to refer Wan Ahmad Fayhsal to the Parliament's Rights and Privileges Committee for trying to mislead the Dewan Rakyat on the issue

    "In this matter, I want to refer Machang to the committee for saying that there was a promise to abolish PTPTN and it was listed part of our election manifesto, that is a lie

    ['ptptn', 'loan', 'repayment', 'borrower', 'say']

  • RAFIZI 'SCHOOLS' HAMZAH IN DEWAN RAKYAT ON CONCEPT OF ECONOMIC GROWTH

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/14/rafizi-039schools039-hamzah-in-dewan-rakyat-on-concept-of-economic-growth

    02/14/2023, 15:08

    72.0% Shortened!

    Rafizi had said that although Malaysia registered gross domestic product (GDP) growth of 8.7% last year, the quarter-by-quarter growth recorded a steady decline

    He explained that the 8.7% referred to annual growth of the size of the economy from 2021 to 2022

    “It is not me who needs to correct the data, but the Opposition leader must correct his understanding regarding economic growth,” said Rafizi

    “We should not deny the fact that the growth was planned by the previous government

    “Rafizi wants to state that as if there is no growth, let’s not show there was economic decline

    “We should not be content with 8.7% growth

    The past four quarters (last year) have declined and in 2023, we will face slower economic growth,” said Rafizi

    ['economic', 'growth', 'say', 'economy', 'rafizi']

  • PERODUA LAUNCHES ALL-NEW AXIA, PRICED FROM RM38,600

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2023/02/14/perodua-launches-all-new-axia-priced-from-rm38600

    02/14/2023, 15:07

    57.14% Shortened!

    The 1.0 litre D-CVT (Dual-Mode CVT) all-new Perodua Axia comes in four variants G, X, SE, and AV

    The all-new Axia offers a variety of choices for Malaysians to choose from

    “With the all-new Perodua Axia launched, our focus (for this new model) are twofold, the first is maximising deliveries to our customers and to convert previous generation Axia bookings to the All-New Axia,” president and chief executive officer Datuk Zainal Abidin Ahmad said in a statement

    He said that of the 44,000 existing orders, Perodua was able to convince 13,600 of its customers to convert to the latest model and coupled with over new 6,500 bookings (since Jan 31) – the compact car company has a combined orders of 20,100 units

    Zainal said that the all-new Perodua Axia a sales target of 5,700 units a month, and to meet this sales target, the compact car company has set the model’s annual production target to over 82,000 units.

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    The 1.0 litre D-CVT (Dual-Mode CVT) all-new Perodua Axia comes in four variants G, X, SE, and AV

    The all-new Axia offers a variety of choices for Malaysians to choose from

    “With the all-new Perodua Axia launched, our focus (for this new model) are twofold, the first is maximising deliveries to our customers and to convert previous generation Axia bookings to the All-New Axia,” president and chief executive officer Datuk Zainal Abidin Ahmad said in a statement

    He said that of the 44,000 existing orders, Perodua was able to convince 13,600 of its customers to convert to the latest model and coupled with over new 6,500 bookings (since Jan 31) – the compact car company has a combined orders of 20,100 units

    Zainal said that the all-new Perodua Axia a sales target of 5,700 units a month, and to meet this sales target, the compact car company has set the model’s annual production target to over 82,000 units.

  • ANDREW TATE ARREST CASTS LIGHT ON ROMANIA'S SEXCAM BOOM

    https://www.thestar.com.my/tech/tech-news/2023/02/14/andrew-tate-arrest-casts-light-on-romanias-sexcam-boom

    02/14/2023, 14:08

    81.82% Shortened!

    Alexandra, head of marketing for a videochat studio, poses for photos in one of the studio rooms in Bucharest, Romania on Jan 26, 2023

    The arrest of controversial online influencer Andrew Tate's for alleged rape and human trafficking in Romania has shone a spotlight on the country's burgeoning sexcam industry

    “The Tate brothers are not known in the industry and have never participated in industry events,” said Maria Boroghina, a manager at Best Studios, one of Romania’s biggest sexcam operators

    ‘This is not fair’ But defenders of the industry like Boroghina and Ruxandra Tataru, an organiser of a sexcam industry event called the Bucharest Summit, said they would welcome regulation

    “Romanian women represent 40% of the videochat industry worldwide,” said Anastasia, a 33-year-old former camgirl, who is the “models’ representative” at another Bucharest studio, Models4Models

    The studio’s head of marketing, Alexandra, who declined to give her full name, said it was “unjust that from a scandal like this people think that Andrew Tate represents the videochat industry

    ['studio', 'tate', 'industry', 'woman', 'romanian']

    Tuesday, 14 Feb 2023

    Nur Shahirah Choo Fui Tze Chen, 40 who is now heavily pregnant, pleaded guilty to the charge after it was read to her before magistrate Mohamad Ibrahim Mohammad Ghulam

    According to the facts of the case, both the accused and the victim were colleagues at a reflexology centre but Nur Shahirah was fired a few weeks before the incident at the restaurant

    She then realised that her attacker was her former colleague

    The accused, who also had a 13-year-old child, said she was also due to give birth at any time

    Deputy public prosecutor Nurul Muhaimin Mohd Azman asked the court to impose a sentence that would deter would-be offenders.

  • TECH LAYOFFS: COMPANIES THAT ANNOUNCED JOB-CUTS SO FAR IN 2023

    https://www.peoplematters.in/news/employee-relations/tech-layoffs-2023-companies-that-have-made-cuts-36867

    02/14/2023, 14:08

    92.68% Shortened!

    That's around 3.6% of their global workforce

    eBay goes ahead with plan to slash 4% of its workforce The online marketplace said in February it would cut 500 jobs, or about 4% of its global workforce, according to an internal email included with a securities filing

    The cuts will include five per cent of the company's global workforce, reports Bloomberg, citing sources

    IBM annunces plan to slash 3,900 jobs - 1.5% of its workforce The company plans to cut about 3,900 workers, its chief financial officer declared in January

    Ford to cut 3,200 jobs across Europe to cut costs In the last week of January, Ford Motor Co

    The planned workforce reduction is part of the company's efforts to cut costs to face ongoing macroeconomic conditions amid recession fears

    ['job', 'layoff', 'company', 'cut', 'workforce']

  • ZAFRUL: STRONG POLICIES, EV ECOSYSTEM TO RAMP UP MALAYSIA'S EV SECTOR

    https://www.thesundaily.my/business/zafrul-strong-policies-ev-ecosystem-to-ramp-up-malaysia-s-ev-sector-AE10634062

    02/14/2023, 14:08

    57.14% Shortened!

    Minister Tengku Datuk Seri Zafrul Tengku Abdul Aziz said Malaysia is seriously looking into policies that will support energy sectors to ensure that the EV ecosystem is complete and fully supported, including standards, certification and verification related to charging systems and battery disposal activities

    “Opportunities abound in the areas of renewable energy (RE), energy efficiency, energy storage systems, and support services for EVs, such as EV charging stations, operation and maintenance,” he said in his keynote address at Malaysia’s EV Conference 2023

    To capitalise on the EV market, Tengku Zafrul said the government will also strengthen Malaysia’s Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET)

    He added that the government has made a firm commitment to strategically develop the automotive industry, particularly the EV industry, as part of the zero greenhouse gas (GHG) target by 2050

    He said the shift to RE sources and electric transportation is a significant step towards Malaysia’s commitment to net-zero GHG by 2050, as outlined in the Twelfth Malaysia Plan (12MP)

    Tengku Zafrul added that under the Low Carbon Mobility Blueprint 2021-2030, Malaysia aims to have EVs and hybrid to account for at least 15 per cent of the total industry volume (TIV) by 2030

    ['malaysia', 'industry', 'say', 'tengku', 'charge']

    Minister Tengku Datuk Seri Zafrul Tengku Abdul Aziz said Malaysia is seriously looking into policies that will support energy sectors to ensure that the EV ecosystem is complete and fully supported, including standards, certification and verification related to charging systems and battery disposal activities

    “Opportunities abound in the areas of renewable energy (RE), energy efficiency, energy storage systems, and support services for EVs, such as EV charging stations, operation and maintenance,” he said in his keynote address at Malaysia’s EV Conference 2023

    To capitalise on the EV market, Tengku Zafrul said the government will also strengthen Malaysia’s Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET)

    He added that the government has made a firm commitment to strategically develop the automotive industry, particularly the EV industry, as part of the zero greenhouse gas (GHG) target by 2050

    He said the shift to RE sources and electric transportation is a significant step towards Malaysia’s commitment to net-zero GHG by 2050, as outlined in the Twelfth Malaysia Plan (12MP)

    Tengku Zafrul added that under the Low Carbon Mobility Blueprint 2021-2030, Malaysia aims to have EVs and hybrid to account for at least 15 per cent of the total industry volume (TIV) by 2030

    ['malaysia', 'industry', 'say', 'tengku', 'charge']

  • TENGKU ZAFRUL: GOVT LOOKING INTO STRONG POLICIES TO RAMP UP MALAYSIA’S EV SECTOR

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/14/tengku-zafrul-govt-looking-into-strong-policies-to-ramp-up-malaysias-ev-sector/54867

    02/14/2023, 14:07

    60.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 14 — Malaysia is taking steps to strengthen its position through various policy measures, leveraging the existing electric vehicles (EV) ecosystem and ensuring a solid talent pipeline to help the development of the EV industry in Malaysia, said the Ministry of International Trade and Industry (Miti)

    Minister Datuk Seri Tengku Zafrul Tengku Abdul Aziz said Malaysia is seriously looking into policies that will support energy sectors to ensure that the EV ecosystem is complete and fully supported, including standards, certification and verification related to charging systems and battery disposal activities

    To capitalise on the EV market, Tengku Zafrul said the government will also strengthen Malaysia’s Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET)

    He added that the government has made a firm commitment to strategically develop the automotive industry, particularly the EV industry, as part of the zero greenhouse gas (GHG) target by 2050

    He said the shift to RE sources and electric transportation is a significant step towards Malaysia’s commitment to net-zero GHG by 2050, as outlined in the Twelfth Malaysia Plan (12MP)

    Tengku Zafrul added that under the Low Carbon Mobility Blueprint 2021-2030, Malaysia aims to have EVs and hybrid to account for at least 15 per cent of the total industry volume (TIV) by 2030

    ['malaysia', 'industry', 'say', 'tengku', 'charge']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 14 — Malaysia is taking steps to strengthen its position through various policy measures, leveraging the existing electric vehicles (EV) ecosystem and ensuring a solid talent pipeline to help the development of the EV industry in Malaysia, said the Ministry of International Trade and Industry (Miti)

    Minister Datuk Seri Tengku Zafrul Tengku Abdul Aziz said Malaysia is seriously looking into policies that will support energy sectors to ensure that the EV ecosystem is complete and fully supported, including standards, certification and verification related to charging systems and battery disposal activities

    To capitalise on the EV market, Tengku Zafrul said the government will also strengthen Malaysia’s Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET)

    He added that the government has made a firm commitment to strategically develop the automotive industry, particularly the EV industry, as part of the zero greenhouse gas (GHG) target by 2050

    He said the shift to RE sources and electric transportation is a significant step towards Malaysia’s commitment to net-zero GHG by 2050, as outlined in the Twelfth Malaysia Plan (12MP)

    Tengku Zafrul added that under the Low Carbon Mobility Blueprint 2021-2030, Malaysia aims to have EVs and hybrid to account for at least 15 per cent of the total industry volume (TIV) by 2030

    ['malaysia', 'industry', 'say', 'tengku', 'charge']



  • PHILIPPINES' MARCOS SUMMONS CHINA ENVOY OVER LASER INCIDENT AT SEA

    https://www.channelnewsasia.com/asia/philippines-condemns-china-laser-use-against-ship-3276726

    02/14/2023

    78.57% Shortened!

    Marcos confronted Chinese ambassador Huang Xilian on Tuesday "over the increasing frequency and intensity of actions by China" against the Philippine Coast Guard and Filipino fishermen, spokeswoman Cheloy Velicaria-Garafil said

    Chinese foreign ministry spokesman Wang Wenbin insisted on Tuesday that the China Coast Guard had "operated with professionalism and restraint"

    US State Department spokesman Ned Price on Monday criticised the China Coast Guard's actions as "provocative and unsafe"

    "The United States stands with our Philippine allies in the face of the People's Republic of China coast guard's reported use of laser devices against the crew of a Philippine Coast Guard ship," Price said

    The Philippine patrol boat was supporting a "rotation and resupply mission" for the marines in Second Thomas Shoal when the Chinese vessel pointed the laser light at them twice, the Philippine Coast Guard said on Monday

    It was not the first time that a Chinese coast guard boat had pointed a laser light at a Philippine vessel, said Commodore Jay Tarriela, a maritime security adviser in the Philippine Coast Guard

    ['say', 'china', 'philippine', 'coast', 'guard']

    Marcos confronted Chinese ambassador Huang Xilian on Tuesday "over the increasing frequency and intensity of actions by China" against the Philippine Coast Guard and Filipino fishermen, spokeswoman Cheloy Velicaria-Garafil said

    Chinese foreign ministry spokesman Wang Wenbin insisted on Tuesday that the China Coast Guard had "operated with professionalism and restraint"

    US State Department spokesman Ned Price on Monday criticised the China Coast Guard's actions as "provocative and unsafe"

    "The United States stands with our Philippine allies in the face of the People's Republic of China coast guard's reported use of laser devices against the crew of a Philippine Coast Guard ship," Price said

    The Philippine patrol boat was supporting a "rotation and resupply mission" for the marines in Second Thomas Shoal when the Chinese vessel pointed the laser light at them twice, the Philippine Coast Guard said on Monday

    It was not the first time that a Chinese coast guard boat had pointed a laser light at a Philippine vessel, said Commodore Jay Tarriela, a maritime security adviser in the Philippine Coast Guard

    ['say', 'china', 'philippine', 'coast', 'guard']



  • RINGGIT OPENS HIGHER AGAINST US$ AHEAD OF US CPI PRINT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2023/02/14/ringgit-opens-higher-against-us-ahead-of-us-cpi-print

    02/14/2023

    45.45% Shortened!

    Tuesday, 14 Feb 2023

    SPI Asset Management managing director Stephen Innes said the US dollar weakened amid better risk sentiment and as fast money traders performed the usual housekeeping duties by reducing risk ahead of Tuesday's US inflation print

    "If the US CPI print fails to print above grade, an improving macro backdrop could further cheapen the US dollar,” he told Bernama

    From a technical point of view, the ringgit-US dollar could move to the 4.4000 region where it might encounter resistance,” he said

    Back home, the ringgit, however, traded lower against a basket of major currencies

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    For couple Ooi Min Keun, 41, and Chan Yen Leng, 38, this is their third year together

  • LYNAS' MALAYSIAN RARE EARTHS PLANT FACES PART CLOSURE AS REGULATOR KEEPS CURBS

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/655120

    02/14/2023, 13:07

    57.14% Shortened!

    "Lynas is not allowed to carry out any activities that will produce radioactive waste in Malaysia after July 2023," Malaysia's Science, Technology and Innovation Minister Chang Lih Kang said in a statement on Facebook on Tuesday

    “We will now proceed with administrative and legal appeals to ensure that Lynas is treated fairly and equitably as a foreign direct investor and a significant employer and contributor to the Malaysian economy." Under its new permit, Lynas will be able to continue other parts of processing until March 2026

    Lynas had applied to Malaysia's regulator for the conditions to be removed because they "represent a significant variation from the conditions under which..

    Lynas made the initial decision to invest in Malaysia", it said

    The decision puts a greater focus on the construction timeline for Lynas' cracking and leaching facility in central Australia, broker Canaccord said in a report, with Lynas able to use stockpiles for a time if the plant is not ready by July 1

    Lynas ships rare earths concentrate to Malaysia from its Mount Weld operations in Central Australia where it is building the processing plant in the town of Kalgoorlie to add capacity and mitigate Malaysia's regulatory risk

    ['search', 'malaysia', 'lynas', 'rare', 'earth']

    "Lynas is not allowed to carry out any activities that will produce radioactive waste in Malaysia after July 2023," Malaysia's Science, Technology and Innovation Minister Chang Lih Kang said in a statement on Facebook on Tuesday

    “We will now proceed with administrative and legal appeals to ensure that Lynas is treated fairly and equitably as a foreign direct investor and a significant employer and contributor to the Malaysian economy."     Lynas had applied to Malaysia's regulator for the conditions to be removed because they "represent a significant variation from the conditions under which..

    Lynas made the initial decision to invest in Malaysia", it said

    The decision puts a greater focus on the construction timeline for Lynas' cracking and leaching facility in central Australia, broker Canaccord said in a report, with Lynas able to use stockpiles for a time if the plant is not ready by July 1

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 14 — Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim said today he may leave for Turkey tonight to show support for the country that was hit by the earthquake last week

    He told the Parliament that it would be timely for him to leave for Turkey now as various leaders from other countries have also arrived at the scene

    “I’m considering leaving for Turkey tonight as Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan has asked if it is possible that I could be in Turkey in person,” Anwar told the Dewan Rakyat during the Prime Minister’s Question time

    Anwar was responding to questions in relation to relief efforts carried out by Malaysia’s Special Malaysia Disaster Assistance and Rescue Team (SMART) that was among the first to arrive in Turkey

    “It is a question of humanitarian and aid for [Syria], we don’t care about US policy

    The Malaysian government in a meeting, we decided since a week ago to send a team and aid as soon Syria is ready to receive us

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 14 — Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim said today he may leave for Turkey tonight to show support for the country that was hit by the earthquake last week

  • BURSA MALAYSIA OPENS HIGHER AMID POSITIVE MARKET SENTIMENT

    https://www.thesundaily.my/business/bursa-malaysia-opens-higher-amid-positive-market-sentiment-EE10633117

    02/14/2023, 10:08

    53.85% Shortened!

    The key index opened 1.96 points better at 1,477.13

    With a broad-based rebound on Wall Street overnight, the market could be positioning ahead of the release of the January Consumer Price Index inflation report, whereby most of the traders could be anticipating cooling inflation, it said

    Meanwhile, among Bursa heavyweights, Maybank and Petronas Chemicals gained 3.0 sen each to RM8.80 and RM8.11, respectively, Public Bank rose 1.0 sen to RM4.20, CIMB was flat at RM5.44, and Tenaga Nasional fell 3.0 sen to RM9.88

    As for the actives, both Hong Seng and Pesona Metro added 1.0 sen to 21 sen and 31 sen, respectively, Visdynamics increased 3.0 sen to RM1.06, and CSH Alliance slid 1.5 sen to 5.0 sen, while Iris and Aimflex were flat at 11.5 sen and 15.5 sen, respectively

    On the index board, the FBM Emas Index grew 18.74 points to 10,752.51, the FBMT 100 Index improved 19.06 points to 10,422.63, the FBM 70 Index advanced 22.76 points to 13,563.19, the FBM Emas Shariah Index went up 18.34 points to 11,039.61, and the FBM ACE Index was 34.07 points firmer at 5,709.43

    Sector-wise, the Plantation Index climbed 8.09 points to 6,846.96, the Industrial Products and Services Index edged up 0.42 of-a-point to 188.42, the Energy Index rose 0.82 of-a-point to 898.85, and the Financial Services Index gained 29.93 points to 16,180.89

    ['market', 'fbm', 'point', 'index', 'sector']

    The key index opened 1.96 points better at 1,477.13

    With a broad-based rebound on Wall Street overnight, the market could be positioning ahead of the release of the January Consumer Price Index inflation report, whereby most of the traders could be anticipating cooling inflation, it said

    Meanwhile, among Bursa heavyweights, Maybank and Petronas Chemicals gained 3.0 sen each to RM8.80 and RM8.11, respectively, Public Bank rose 1.0 sen to RM4.20, CIMB was flat at RM5.44, and Tenaga Nasional fell 3.0 sen to RM9.88

    As for the actives, both Hong Seng and Pesona Metro added 1.0 sen to 21 sen and 31 sen, respectively, Visdynamics increased 3.0 sen to RM1.06, and CSH Alliance slid 1.5 sen to 5.0 sen, while Iris and Aimflex were flat at 11.5 sen and 15.5 sen, respectively

    On the index board, the FBM Emas Index grew 18.74 points to 10,752.51, the FBMT 100 Index improved 19.06 points to 10,422.63, the FBM 70 Index advanced 22.76 points to 13,563.19, the FBM Emas Shariah Index went up 18.34 points to 11,039.61, and the FBM ACE Index was 34.07 points firmer at 5,709.43

    Sector-wise, the Plantation Index climbed 8.09 points to 6,846.96, the Industrial Products and Services Index edged up 0.42 of-a-point to 188.42, the Energy Index rose 0.82 of-a-point to 898.85, and the Financial Services Index gained 29.93 points to 16,180.89

  • FSG HAS RESTORED BEST LIVERPOOL TRADEMARK BY HIRING TRUE INNOVATOR TO HELP KLOPP

    https://www.liverpool.com/liverpool-fc-news/features/fsg-liverpool-trademark-jurgen-klopp-26223465

    02/14/2023, 10:08

    79.31% Shortened!

    'Pitch control' was the name of the product, and it had never been seen before

    "It shows how you can close off space, how you can create space with runs," Spearman told liverpoolfc.com in an exclusive interview

    The holder of a Harvard doctorate was appointed as Liverpool's lead data scientist in 2018, and he was empowered to build upon his pitch control work by effectively completing his project at Anfield

    Spearman's pitch control model can determine the optimal decision for any player in possession at any given moment — which can help players improve and reflect upon their performances — and his work has even allowed the Reds to determine pressing 'victims' by calculating the amount of time it takes for each of their opponents to control the ball; those who require more time can be exploited

    Graham has managed Liverpool's data science department for more than a decade but earlier this term, news emerged of his impending resignation

    By naming Spearman as Graham's heir, Liverpool is fostering some much needed continuity at a turbulent time for the club, and it is replacing a pioneer with an innovator.

    ['spearman', 'liverpool', 'data', 'work', 'player']

    'Pitch control' was the name of the product, and it had never been seen before

    "It shows how you can close off space, how you can create space with runs," Spearman told liverpoolfc.com in an exclusive interview

    The holder of a Harvard doctorate was appointed as Liverpool's lead data scientist in 2018, and he was empowered to build upon his pitch control work by effectively completing his project at Anfield

    Spearman's pitch control model can determine the optimal decision for any player in possession at any given moment — which can help players improve and reflect upon their performances — and his work has even allowed the Reds to determine pressing 'victims' by calculating the amount of time it takes for each of their opponents to control the ball; those who require more time can be exploited

    Graham has managed Liverpool's data science department for more than a decade but earlier this term, news emerged of his impending resignation

    By naming Spearman as Graham's heir, Liverpool is fostering some much needed continuity at a turbulent time for the club, and it is replacing a pioneer with an innovator.

    ['spearman', 'liverpool', 'data', 'work', 'player']

    The Reds are one of United's biggest rivals and while he is regarded as a club legend in Manchester, it was Liverpool who Solskjaer grew up supporting

    I was one of the supporters who followed because they won everything, Hard enough to say as a Man United player but they were the better team in the 80s." HAVE YOUR SAY! What should be Manchester United's starting line-up against Barcelona? Comment below

    I never confirm that one! I’m a Manchester United fan through and through

    In his interview with the Kings of Europe podcast, Solskjaer also opened up on his preparations for his contribution to United's famous Champions League win 24 years ago

    "So, I asked him to get someone to step in for him for an hour so he can watch the full game because it was just one of these mental things that I had this feeling." Can United mount a title challenge? Get our FREE daily Manchester United email newsletter

    ['solskjaer', 'manchester', 'united', 'red', 'liverpool']

    The Reds are one of United's biggest rivals and while he is regarded as a club legend in Manchester, it was Liverpool who Solskjaer grew up supporting

    https://www.liverpool.com/liverpool-fc-news/transfer-news/liverpool-transfer-salah-van-dijk-26227298

    02/14/2023, 10:08

    73.91% Shortened!

    Just nine months ago, there was a strong argument to say that Liverpool had not only the best defensive group in the Premier League, but in the club’s illustrious history

    The bigger worry for Klopp is that unlike at previous points in their Liverpool careers, their poor play can’t be blamed on injuries

    Liverpool fan Josko Gvardiol is the most high profile, and Bayer Leverkusen’s Johnathan Tah the most recent, but the most suitable may be Atalanta’s Giorgio Scalvini

    A right-footed centre-back who plays on the left of a back three doesn’t necessarily sound like a perfect fit for a team that only deviates from a back four occasionally during injury time

    For most of his Liverpool career, the club has been trying to find a reliable backup for Mohamed Salah

    Liverpool will have to fight with the big guns of Italian football to secure Scalvini, but if it can bring him to the club, Klopp would reap short and long-term benefits in two potentially problem positions.

  • ANXIOUS TO SEE EPF’S MAGIC...

    https://themalaysianreserve.com/2023/02/14/anxious-to-see-epfs-magic-number/

    02/14/2023, 10:08

    79.31% Shortened!

    You follow the dividend rate as it translates straight into your retirement pool.  The team at EPF is entrusted with an important job

    As stated under Section 27 of the EPF Act 1991, the guaranteed minimum dividend rate is 2.5% per year on members’ savings

    Hence, as a member, you will receive the minimum dividend rate, come what may

    However, the dividend rate for Simpanan Shariah is based on the actual performance of Shariah-compliant investment without any minimum guaranteed dividend of 2.5%, according to information at the fund’s website

    The fund recorded a total gross investment income (GII) of RM39.31 billion, down 18% or RM8.71 billion, compared to the RM48.02 billion recorded in the same period in 2021.  In 2020, its total dividend payout was RM47.64 billion, with RM42.88 billion going towards the conventional savings and RM4.76 billion to the Shariah portion

    According to the breakdown provided by EPF, the payout amount required for every 1% dividend rate for that year was RM8.25 billion for Simpanan Konvensional and RM972 million for Simpanan Shariah.  EPF has gone through a tough time with the Covid-19 pandemic badgering markets all around

    ['epf', 'fund', 'dividend', 'rate', 'saving']

    You follow the dividend rate as it translates straight into your retirement pool.  The team at EPF is entrusted with an important job

    As stated under Section 27 of the EPF Act 1991, the guaranteed minimum dividend rate is 2.5% per year on members’ savings

    Hence, as a member, you will receive the minimum dividend rate, come what may

    However, the dividend rate for Simpanan Shariah is based on the actual performance of Shariah-compliant investment without any minimum guaranteed dividend of 2.5%, according to information at the fund’s website

    The fund recorded a total gross investment income (GII) of RM39.31 billion, down 18% or RM8.71 billion, compared to the RM48.02 billion recorded in the same period in 2021.  In 2020, its total dividend payout was RM47.64 billion, with RM42.88 billion going towards the conventional savings and RM4.76 billion to the Shariah portion

    According to the breakdown provided by EPF, the payout amount required for every 1% dividend rate for that year was RM8.25 billion for Simpanan Konvensional and RM972 million for Simpanan Shariah.  EPF has gone through a tough time with the Covid-19 pandemic badgering markets all around

    ['epf', 'fund', 'dividend', 'rate', 'saving']



  • FSG HAS RESTORED ITS BEST LIVERPOOL TRADEMARK BY PROMOTING TRUE INNOVATOR TO HELP JÜRGEN KLOPP

    https://www.liverpool.com/liverpool-fc-news/features/fsg-liverpool-trademark-jurgen-klopp-26223465

    02/14/2023, 10:07

    79.31% Shortened!

    'Pitch control' was the name of the product, and it had never been seen before

    "It shows how you can close off space, how you can create space with runs," Spearman told liverpoolfc.com in an exclusive interview

    The holder of a Harvard doctorate was appointed as Liverpool's lead data scientist in 2018, and he was empowered to build upon his pitch control work by effectively completing his project at Anfield

    Spearman's pitch control model can determine the optimal decision for any player in possession at any given moment — which can help players improve and reflect upon their performances — and his work has even allowed the Reds to determine pressing 'victims' by calculating the amount of time it takes for each of their opponents to control the ball; those who require more time can be exploited

    Graham has managed Liverpool's data science department for more than a decade but earlier this season, news emerged of his impending resignation

    By naming Spearman as Graham's heir, Liverpool is fostering some much needed continuity at a turbulent time for the club, and it is replacing a pioneer with an innovator.

    ['spearman', 'liverpool', 'data', 'work', 'player']

    'Pitch control' was the name of the product, and it had never been seen before

    "It shows how you can close off space, how you can create space with runs," Spearman told liverpoolfc.com in an exclusive interview

    The holder of a Harvard doctorate was appointed as Liverpool's lead data scientist in 2018, and he was empowered to build upon his pitch control work by effectively completing his project at Anfield

    Spearman's pitch control model can determine the optimal decision for any player in possession at any given moment — which can help players improve and reflect upon their performances — and his work has even allowed the Reds to determine pressing 'victims' by calculating the amount of time it takes for each of their opponents to control the ball; those who require more time can be exploited

    Graham has managed Liverpool's data science department for more than a decade but earlier this season, news emerged of his impending resignation

    By naming Spearman as Graham's heir, Liverpool is fostering some much needed continuity at a turbulent time for the club, and it is replacing a pioneer with an innovator.

    ['spearman', 'liverpool', 'data', 'work', 'player']

  • COVID-19: MALAYSIA RECORDS 164 NEW CASES, TOTAL NOW AT 5039650

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/14/covid-19-malaysia-records-164-new-cases-total-now-at-5039650

    02/14/2023, 09:08

    53.85% Shortened!

    The Health Ministry's KKMNow portal reported that 162 of Monday's new Covid-19 infections were locally transmitted while there were two imported cases

    The KKMNow portal also said that as at 11.59pm Monday, there were 9,310 active Covid-19 cases in the country, with 8,978, or 96.4%, observing home quarantine

    KKMNow also reported that Malaysia's current overall hospital utilisation rate stood at 75.1% while the ICU utilisation rate nationwide was 63%, as at 11.59pm Monday

    The Health Ministry's GitHub data repository reported that one death due to Covid-19 was reported in Johor on Monday, bringing the total number of fatalities due to Covid-19 to 36,952 since the pandemic began.

    Report it to us

  • KING'S DECREE MUST SERVE AS REFERENCE FOR MPS, SAY EXPERTS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/14/king039s-decree-must-serve-as-reference-for-mps-say-experts

    02/14/2023, 09:08

    62.5% Shortened!

    Tuesday, 14 Feb 2023

    Yang di-Pertuan Agong Al-Sultan Abdullah Ri'ayatuddin Al-Mustafa Billah Shah delivering his Royal Address in the Dewan Rakyat on Monday (Feb 13)

    Institute for Research and Development of Policy (IRDP) research and advocacy officer Farhan Rawi said all input and content of the decree are also a good start for MPs to begin their debate on the Royal Address on Tuesday (Feb 14)

    If you look at it, there are many inputs or information that His Majesty has decreed and it is a policy speech that should be the reference for MPs to see what are the priorities and direction that the government will undertake this year

    Muhammad said that His Majesty’s decree contained three items of significance, namely the togetherness between the Royal Institution and the government, His Majesty’s desire for the existing government administration, thus becoming a stage for the King to give advice not only to the MPs but also to the government and the people

    Muhammad added that the decree by His Majesty, who hoped that the government would be able to carry out its responsibility of governing the country and the Opposition would carry out its responsibility by offering constructive criticism for the good of the people and the country, was something that needed to be heeded by all parties

    ['royal', 'decree', 'mp', 'say', 'also']

    02/14/2023, 08:08

    71.43% Shortened!

    “Although the agricultural sector expanded marginally to 0.1% last year from -0.2% in the previous year, the positive growth in all sectors of the economy also contributed to the sterling growth performance,” he told theSun

    Yeah said the economy rebounded in 2022 to above its potential growth of 5%-6%, following a moderate growth of 3.1% in 2021

    It will be the best blueprint for Malaysia’s future growth,” he said

    “Any rise in the OPR will constrain economic growth

    It is a trade-off between lower inflation and higher economic growth

    The last hike was to increase the OPR to 2.75% in November last year

  • SECOND HOSPITAL TO BE SET UP

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/14/second-hospital-to-be-set-up

    02/14/2023, 08:08

    71.43% Shortened!

    “The current field hospital has 110 personnel, but this new field hospital is smaller and only for Level 2 medical services, namely emergency response,” he told reporters after launching the 90th Army Day celebration here yesterday, reported Bernama

    The Malaysian Armed Forces has set up one field hospital in Turkiye to provide medical services to earthquake victims in the country, and it is expected to be operational tomorrow

    The devastating earthquake measuring 7.8 on the Richter scale that hit southern Turkiye and northwestern Syria last Monday has claimed over 35,000 lives so far

    Meanwhile, the government is engaging with the Syria embassy here on the best possible options to deliver relief assistance to southern Turkiye in the earthquake that also severely hit Syria

    This includes the urgent deployment of an advance team from Malaysia to Syria, Wisma Putra said

    In a tweet, the Foreign Ministry said the Joint Secretariat to Facilitate the Relief Assistance to Syria met with the chargé d’affaires of the Syria embassy in Malaysia, Mohd Ghiath Ibrahim, at the ministry in Putrajaya

    ['army', 'field', 'hospital', 'turkiye', 'earthquake']

  • 'MERELY OFFERING A FILLING MEAL'

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/14/merely-offering-a-filling-meal

    02/14/2023, 08:07

    70.0% Shortened!

    Datuk Seri Salahuddin Ayub said this is because the initiative has limited menu options whose only objective is to provide a filling meal

    “I doubt there will be much direct competition as the target groups of customers for Menu Rahmah and small-time food traders are very different,” he told reporters after launching Menu Rahmah for Presma (the Malaysian Muslim Restaurant Owners Association) at a nasi kandar restaurant in Cheras here yesterday

    Salahuddin said the Menu Rahmah initiative is completely voluntary and the ministry had not spent any funds so far on it

    “No operator is forced to join the programme, and they can opt to discontinue offering Menu Rahmah at any time if they believe their business can no longer afford it

    Salahuddin also said Menu Rahmah for more fast-food chains would likely be announced by next week as discussions were still ongoing

    Last week, he said that his ministry had held engagements with several fast-food restaurants such as McDonald’s and Burger King to get them to participate in the Menu Rahmah initiative

    ['menu', 'rahmah', 'initiative', 'say', 'meal']

  • RM1.6MIL IN DRUGS SEIZED

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/14/rm16mil-in-drugs-seized

    02/14/2023, 08:07

    70.0% Shortened!

    Tuesday, 14 Feb 2023

    At least 10 drug bust operations were carried out, which led to the arrest of 12 individuals, including five whom police believe were supplying drug-laced drinks to users in the Klang Valley

    City police chief Comm Datuk Azmi Abu Kassim said police have taken three syndicates off the streets following the raids between Feb 7 and Feb 9

    Comm Azmi said police conducted a third raid on Feb 9 and arrested a 37-year-old man and seized another kilogram of ketamine

    “We were tracking the suspect for over two months prior to his arrest,” he said

    Those with information on drug activities can contact the Narcotic Crime Investigation Department WhatsApp hotline at 012-2087 222.

    ['feb', 'drug', 'seize', 'raid', 'police']

  • CHINA SAYS US FLEW HIGH-ALTITUDE BALLOONS OVER ITS AIRSPACE

    https://www.malaysiakini.com/world/654988

    02/14/2023, 07:08

    50.0% Shortened!

    China's accusation widened a dispute with United States that began last weekend after the US military shot down what it says was a Chinese spy balloon, prompting top US diplomat Antony Blinken to cancel a trip to Beijing designed to ease tensions

    "Since last year, US high-altitude balloons have undergone more than 10 illegal flights into Chinese airspace without the approval of the relevant Chinese departments," Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesperson Wang Wenbin said at a regular briefing in Beijing in response to a question

    White House national security spokesperson John Kirby denied China's accusation

    China's assertion comes after the United States shot down what it called a Chinese surveillance balloon off the coast of South Carolina on Feb 4 after it had drifted across the continental United States for days

    China said the balloon was a civilian research craft that was mistakenly blown off course and accused the United States of overreacting

    Wang said he had no information on the latest three objects shot down by the United States

    ['china', 'say', 'balloon', 'united', 'state']

    China's accusation widened a dispute with United States that began last weekend after the US military shot down what it says was a Chinese spy balloon, prompting top US diplomat Antony Blinken to cancel a trip to Beijing designed to ease tensions

    "Since last year, US high-altitude balloons have undergone more than 10 illegal flights into Chinese airspace without the approval of the relevant Chinese departments," Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesperson Wang Wenbin said at a regular briefing in Beijing in response to a question

    White House national security spokesperson John Kirby denied China's accusation

    China's assertion comes after the United States shot down what it called a Chinese surveillance balloon off the coast of South Carolina on Feb 4 after it had drifted across the continental United States for days

    China said the balloon was a civilian research craft that was mistakenly blown off course and accused the United States of overreacting

    Wang said he had no information on the latest three objects shot down by the United States

    ['china', 'say', 'balloon', 'united', 'state']

    02/14/2023, 07:07

    75.0% Shortened!

    Cristiano Ronaldo left Manchester United in acrimonious circumstances back in November, but John Barnes believes the Red Devils have thrived since the superstar attacker departed Liverpool legend John Barnes has named Marcus Rashford and Jadon Sancho as the two players who have benefited most from Cristiano Ronaldo's exit from Manchester United

    “I think that since Ronaldo has gone, look at Sancho, look at Rashford, a lot of players are doing better because Ronaldo overshadowed them," Barnes told BonusCodeBets

    I think it’s not a surprise to me that you can see an improvement in him since Ronaldo is not there anymore

    And Barnes has hailed him as a "fantastic player" who can now regain his confidence with Ronaldo having departed from the limelight

    "He was overshadowed by the likes of Ronaldo and Fernandes so his confidence suffered because he’s a young player

  • BUDGET 2023: CASH PAYOUTS OF BETWEEN S$700 AND S$2,250 OVER FIVE YEARS FOR ADULT SINGAPOREANS AS PART OF ENHANCED ASSURANCE PACKAGE

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/singapore/2023/02/14/budget-2023-cash-payouts-of-between-s700-and-s2250-over-five-years-for-adult-singaporeans-as-part-of-enhanced-assurance-package/54954

    02/14/2023

    84.21% Shortened!

    Those earning more than S$100,000 a year will receive smaller amounts of between S$100 and S$200 a year, totalling S$700

    Those who earn less than S$22,000 a year can expect to receive S$400, while those who earn between S$34,000 and S$100,000 can expect S$200

    Those residing in homes with an annual value of S$13,000 and below will receive S$200 more this year, or S$700 in total, followed by an additional S$150 next year

    Those residing in homes with an annual value of above S$13,000 and up to S$21,000 will receive S$100 more this year, or a total of S$350, followed by an additional S$100 next year

    Each Singaporean aged six and under will receive a one-off S$400 top-up to their Child Development Account from September this year

    “We provided comprehensive support last year, and we are doing so again this year,” he said

    ['singaporean', 'receive', 'year', 'say', 'child']

    Those earning more than S$100,000 a year will receive smaller amounts of between S$100 and S$200 a year, totalling S$700

    Those who earn less than S$22,000 a year can expect to receive S$400, while those who earn between S$34,000 and S$100,000 can expect S$200

    Those residing in homes with an annual value of S$13,000 and below will receive S$200 more this year, or S$700 in total, followed by an additional S$150 next year

    Those residing in homes with an annual value of above S$13,000 and up to S$21,000 will receive S$100 more this year, or a total of S$350, followed by an additional S$100 next year

    Each Singaporean aged six and under will receive a one-off S$400 top-up to their Child Development Account from September this year

    “We provided comprehensive support last year, and we are doing so again this year,” he said

    ['singaporean', 'receive', 'year', 'say', 'child']

    I truly believe my comments in my previous press conference to defend my club but I didn't represent my club well putting his name in these stupid comments

  • MEDICAL BRAIN DRAIN IN MALAYSIA: LISTEN TO THE DOCTORS’ GROUSES ― THE TRANSLATIONAL IMMUNOLOGY GROUP FOR EDUCATION, RESEARCH AND SOCIETY (TIGERS)

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/what-you-think/2023/02/14/medical-brain-drain-in-malaysia-listen-to-the-doctors-grouses-the-translational-immunology-group-for-education-research-and-society-tigers/54833

    02/14/2023

    86.67% Shortened!

    The “Talent Corps” in 2011 was formed to engineer brain gain and stem brain drain

    Here in this write up, our focus is the medical brain drain from the subspecialists’ perspective

    Increase funding for research A need to be realistic that better research output is doomed to be at average level even when the country has the best brains available when research funding is inhibitory; research funding from present 1 per cent of GDP for Malaysia is untenable

    The amount allocated for research would translate as RM20.21 billion (for a GDP RM1,871 billion in 2022)

    The nation had little home Covid-19 research data to modify CDC recommendation to suit to local needs unlike a few research-intensive countries

    Elsewhere, research funding to GDP revealed the following figures ― South Korea 4.55 per cent, Israel 4.54 per cent, Japan 3.21 per cent, USA 2.79 per cent, Singapore 1.95 per cent, Thailand 1.0 per cent

    ['brain', 'drain', 'medical', 'sub', 'specialist']

    The “Talent Corps” in 2011 was formed to engineer brain gain and stem brain drain

    Here in this write up, our focus is the medical brain drain from the subspecialists’ perspective

    Increase funding for research A need to be realistic that better research output is doomed to be at average level even when the country has the best brains available when research funding is inhibitory; research funding from present 1 per cent of GDP for Malaysia is untenable

    The amount allocated for research would translate as RM20.21 billion (for a GDP RM1,871 billion in 2022)

    The nation had little home Covid-19 research data to modify CDC recommendation to suit to local needs unlike a few research-intensive countries

    Elsewhere, research funding to GDP revealed the following figures ― South Korea 4.55 per cent, Israel 4.54 per cent, Japan 3.21 per cent, USA 2.79 per cent, Singapore 1.95 per cent, Thailand 1.0 per cent

    ['brain', 'drain', 'medical', 'sub', 'specialist']

    02/14/2023, 06:07

    66.67% Shortened!

    GARY NEVILLE was left baffled by the Premier League's "third man rule" after Ruben Dias and Mario Lemina bookings for dissent

    And Wolves captain Ruben Neves appeared to suggest Lemina was carded due to being the third man to run up to ref Jarred Gillett

    It ties into the theory that the third man to run over to contest a ref's decision will automatically be booked

    “What happens to the fourth, if there’s a fourth that attends the scene?” Ex-Premier League official Dermot Gallagher denied the "third man" rule after Lemina and Dias' bookings

    "That's what the referee is upset about there and it's nothing about being the third man there, it's all about players surrounding the referees

    Tuesday, 14 Feb 2023

    Evacuation centres have been set up across the North Island

    New Zealand fire and emergency confirmed that a volunteer firefighter remains inside a house after it slid down a hill in a beachside town near Auckland

    "This has been and continues to be a serious and significant event for our region,” said Rachel Kelleher, Deputy Controller Auckland Emergency Management on Tuesday

    That’s according to Tuttosport, who explain Schuurs’s agent has had a series of contacts with the Premier League sides

    An auction between the English sides could make Schuurs’ asking price rise to €50m and this is the figure the Turin club are targeting from his possible sale in the summer

    The salary Liverpool and other top Premier League sides could offer the player would be almost impossible for Torino to match

    If Schuurs were to be sold for €50m, it would help the Italian club finance other operations in the next window

    ['liverpool', 'gakpo', 'newsletter', 'klopp', 'game']

  • INTEL: SHORT TERM PAIN FOR LONG TERM GAINS (NASDAQ:INTC)

    https://seekingalpha.com/article/4577829-intel-short-term-pain-long-term-gains

    02/14/2023

    84.62% Shortened!

    We believe the industry rebound narrative in 2023, coupled with INTC’s new product, Sapphire Rapid server CPU, and its process node roadmap toward 20A will further improve INTC’s position in the industry

    Our bullish sentiment on INTC is not because we believe the stock will skyrocket in the near term; instead, it's based on our belief that the worst of the macroeconomic headwinds are priced into the stock at current levels

    We believe it's all really about perception, and we believe INTC is better positioned than it was this time last year because the weak demand has been priced into the stock and the outlook

    We believe INTC is progressing well in its process node roadmap toward 20A in 2025

    TechStockPros We recommend that long-term investors look for an entry point for INTC stock at current levels, as we believe the stock is hitting a turning point

    We believe INTC is also well-positioned to become a meaningful foundry player by 2025 with its process node roadmap toward 20A

  • STUDY EXPOSES FAULTLINES: ONLY 5 OUT OF 24 COMPANIES ON TRACK FOR CARBON NEUTRALITY

    https://www.peoplematters.in/news/employee-relations/study-exposes-faultlines-only-5-out-of-24-firms-up-to-corporate-climate-action-goals-36904

    02/14/2023

    66.67% Shortened!

    Climate action towards decarbonisation goal does not match words

    A report titled "The Corporate Climate Responsibility Monitor" exposes the climate action faultlines.     Despite net-zero pledges made by some of the world’s largest corporations that speak up for efforts to reduce their greenhouse gas emissions by 36 per cent, only five of 24 companies’ actions represent a commitment to deep decarbonisation in reality

    The companies analysed in the study have put themselves forward as climate leaders.  Overall, the study found the climate strategies of 15 of the 24 companies to be of low or very low integrity.  Most of the companies’ strategies do not represent examples of good practice climate leadership, it said, and added companies’ climate change commitments often do not add up to what their pledges might suggest

    Companies’ climate pledges for 2030 fall well short of the required ambition and are inappropriately verified

    The authors found that most of these companies’ future net-zero goals and current climate claims are “exaggerated, false, and misleading”

    Overall, the net-zero pledges of the 24 companies translate to a commitment to reduce just 36% of the companies’ combined GHG emission footprint, by the respective net-zero target years.

    ['climate', 'net', 'zero', 'pledge', 'emission']

    Climate action towards decarbonisation goal does not match words

    A report titled "The Corporate Climate Responsibility Monitor" exposes the climate action faultlines.     Despite net-zero pledges made by some of the world’s largest corporations that speak up for efforts to reduce their greenhouse gas emissions by 36 per cent, only five of 24 companies’ actions represent a commitment to deep decarbonisation in reality

    The companies analysed in the study have put themselves forward as climate leaders.  Overall, the study found the climate strategies of 15 of the 24 companies to be of low or very low integrity.  Most of the companies’ strategies do not represent examples of good practice climate leadership, it said, and added companies’ climate change commitments often do not add up to what their pledges might suggest

    Companies’ climate pledges for 2030 fall well short of the required ambition and are inappropriately verified

    The authors found that most of these companies’ future net-zero goals and current climate claims are “exaggerated, false, and misleading”

    Overall, the net-zero pledges of the 24 companies translate to a commitment to reduce just 36% of the companies’ combined GHG emission footprint, by the respective net-zero target years.

    ['climate', 'net', 'zero', 'pledge', 'emission']

  • CANADA'S TRUDEAU SEES 'SOME SORT OF PATTERN' IN DOWNED AERIAL OBJECTS

    https://www.channelnewsasia.com/world/canadas-trudeau-sees-some-sort-pattern-downed-aerial-objects-3275406

    02/14/2023

    62.5% Shortened!

    Canada's Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, speaks in front of Yukon First Nation Chiefs, as he takes part in ceremonies to mark the 50th anniversary of the Council for Yukon First Nations (CYFN) in Whitehorse, Yukon, Canada, February 12, 2023

    "Obviously there is some sort of pattern in there - the fact we are seeing this in a significant degree over the past week is a cause for interest and close attention," Trudeau told reporters in a news conference in Whitehorse, Yukon's capital

    On Friday, an object was shot down over sea ice near Deadhorse, Alaska, and a third object, cylindrical in shape, was destroyed over Canada's Yukon on Saturday, with investigators still hunting for the wreckage, officials said

    Trudeau said search and recovery efforts were underway for the aerial object shot down over Yukon, adding that winter weather was posing challenges

    The presence of those aerial objects in North American airspace was a "very serious situation," Trudeau said

    Be among the first to know the Breaking news

    They had also beaten back an attack on a town in the Kharkiv region, which borders Russia in northeast Ukraine, it said

    The acting head of the Russian-installed administration in Donetsk, Denis Pushilin, said Ukrainian troops were entrenched in Bakhmut but Russian forces were making headway

    Kyiv-based military analyst Oleksandr Musienko told Reuters the Russian push around Bakhmut, Vuhledar and Adviivka could signal the beginning of the big offensive

    LOVE is in the air! The origin of Valentine’s letters may not be as sweet as chocolate, though

    In the poem, he refers to Bonne as his "sweet Valentine"

    Another legend says that St Valentine fell in love with his jailer’s daughter (or the judge’s daughter, in some versions of the tale)

    The legend goes on to say that St Valentine wrote his beloved a note which he signed "from your Valentine"

    That being said, there certainly was no love involved in the annals of the Day of Love

    ['love', 'valentine', 'history', 'say', 'poem']

    He did not say when the meeting took place.  “We agreed on the cost overrun figure of US$1.2 billion

  • AT LEAST THREE DEAD, FIVE INJURED IN SHOOTING AT MICHIGAN STATE UNIVERSITY

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/world/2023/02/14/at-least-three-dead-five-injured-in-shooting-at-michigan-state-university/54844

    02/14/2023

    60.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise MICHIGAN, Feb 14 ― At least three people were killed and five injured after a gunman opened fire at Michigan State University last night, as law enforcement swarmed the main campus in East Lansing searching for a lone suspect, police said

    Hours after the first gunfire erupted, several campus buildings had been cleared and secured by police as officers swept the campus in search of possible additional victims and a single suspect, MSU police said

    MSU is a major public institution of higher education whose flagship East Lansing campus accounts for 50,000 graduate and undergraduate students

    University police said Monday night that all classes and campus activities would be canceled for the next 48 hours

    Monday night's violence came roughly 14 months after a deadly mass shooting on November 30, 2021, at Oxford High School in Oakland County, Michigan, about 80 miles east of East Lansing, in which a 15-year-old student opened fire with a semi-automatic pistol

    Governor Gretchen Whitmer said on Twitter that she was being briefed on the East Lansing shooting

    ['michigan', 'university', 'night', 'campus', 'east']

  • SFA SAYS CONSUMING RAW FISH CAN POSE RISKS AFTER PARASITIC WORM FOUND IN DON DON DONKI RICE BOWL

    https://www.channelnewsasia.com/singapore/parasitic-worm-found-don-donki-sashimi-bowl-rice-raw-fish-3276361

    02/14/2023

    66.67% Shortened!

    A spokesperson for Don Don Donki Singapore said the company is currently in touch with the affected customer

    A parasitic worm was found in a rice bowl from Don Don Donki

    We were happily enjoying the food..

    "Ready-To-Eat (RTE) raw fish is considered a high-risk food as it does not go through a cooking process

    Besides microbiological contamination, the consumption of RTE raw fish also carries a risk of contracting parasitic diseases," the agency said.  However, the risks from eating RTE raw fish can be reduced.  In line with international standards, SFA conducts more stringent checks on food, like raw fish, which are more susceptible to food-borne diseases

    They are tested for a wide range of food-borne hazards including microbial pathogens and the presence of parasites, said the agency.  While importers should source fish from suppliers with proper cold chain management and hygienic handling practices of the fish, "suppliers and retail food establishments should also practice proper segregation of RTE raw fish from other raw food intended for cooking", SFA added

    ['singapore', 'donki', 'say', 'parasitic', 'raw']

    A spokesperson for Don Don Donki Singapore said the company is currently in touch with the affected customer

    A parasitic worm was found in a rice bowl from Don Don Donki

    We were happily enjoying the food..

    "Ready-To-Eat (RTE) raw fish is considered a high-risk food as it does not go through a cooking process

    Besides microbiological contamination, the consumption of RTE raw fish also carries a risk of contracting parasitic diseases," the agency said.  However, the risks from eating RTE raw fish can be reduced.  In line with international standards, SFA conducts more stringent checks on food, like raw fish, which are more susceptible to food-borne diseases

    They are tested for a wide range of food-borne hazards including microbial pathogens and the presence of parasites, said the agency.  While importers should source fish from suppliers with proper cold chain management and hygienic handling practices of the fish, "suppliers and retail food establishments should also practice proper segregation of RTE raw fish from other raw food intended for cooking", SFA added

    ['singapore', 'donki', 'say', 'parasitic', 'raw']

    Sri Aman MP Datuk Masir Anak Kujat will be PBM’s new secretary-general following a supreme council meeting held on Feb 10, the party said in a statement

    “The measure had been taken to rekindle the party’s strength so that it can continue to be relevant in building the country alongside the Malaysian unity government,” it said

    Prior to the 15th general election, PBM had appeared set to be a platform for several former Pakatan Harapan politicians who joined the controversial “Sheraton Move” in 2020, until a tussle broke out between Sng and Datuk Zuraida Kamaruddin who had expected to take over the party

    After a brief confrontation, Sng reasserted control over PBM and reached an accord with Zuraida and her faction, several of whom went on to contest in GE15 on the party’s ticket

    However, all of the party’s candidates except Sng eventually lost in the election.

    ['new', 'follow', 'datuk', 'sng', 'president']

    Former Perak DAP assemblyman Paul Yong, who is appealing his conviction last year for raping a former maid, was named a senior vice president in the party

    Chief Minister Datuk Hajiji Noor today thanked BN secretary-general Datuk Seri Zambry Abdul Kadir for the coalition’s statement of support, saying it was a welcome move that will help the state move forward with its development agenda

    Hajiji also said he had no problem dealing with Sabah BN deputy chief Datuk Yakub Khan as the coalition’s liaison in negotiations

    “We don’t have issues — as long as it’s good for the people and the state

    My intention is to unite everyone and bring good to the state by developing the state with our agenda,” he said

    Hajiji, who is also Parti Gagasan Rakyat Sabah (PGRS) president, has the support of 47 assemblymen in the 79-seat state assembly

    Last Sunday, Zambry announced that the coalition would support Hajiji’s government and also named Yakub Khan as the coalition’s liaison in negotiations with GRS, effectively sidelining Sabah BN and Umno chief Datuk Seri Bung Moktar Radin

    The move saw both Bung and Yakub losing their posts in the state Cabinet.

    ['support', 'sabah', 'coalition', 'government', 'datuk']

  • KING: LET ANWAR BE MY LAST PM

    02/14/2023

    81.25% Shortened!

    “Etched in the nation’s history, I’m the only King who reigned with four prime ministers and four different Cabinets,” said the King

    Sultan Abdullah then recounted the political events that ensued after Dr Mahathir quit as the seventh prime minister on Feb 24, 2020

    Sultan Abdullah said he subsequently appointed Ismail Sabri, whom he earlier thanked for his contributions, as the ninth prime minister on Aug 21, 2021, after the Bera MP garnered the majority support in Parliament

    “Once again, I took on the heavy task of choosing and appointing another prime minister,” said the King

    Based on the Federal Constitution, on Nov 24 last year, the King consented to the appointment of Anwar as the 10th Prime Minister of Malaysia

    “I hope that the 10th Prime Minister will be the last for me, before I return to Pahang Darul Makmur,” said Sultan Abdullah, who was referring to the end of his term as King

    ['prime', 'minister', 'king', 'last', 'sultan']

  • A $1.5 MILLION ANNUITY COULD GET YOU THIS MUCH MONEY EVERY YEAR

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/1-5-million-annuity-earns-130026315.html

    Your annuity will generally pay more if you buy it in one lump sum vs

    The farther in advance you purchase your annuity, generally the higher your return

    A fixed-interest annuity is one in which the return rate is set in advance

    Finally, an indexed annuity is one in which the annuity’s return is pegged to some third-party index like the S&P 500

    How Much Would a $1.5 Million Annuity Pay? So, with all of that said, how much should you expect out of a $1.5 million annuity? For most people saving for retirement, this is the critical question

    However, this time you won’t collect the annuity payments for life

  • WHEN THE ‘IDIOT HEIR’ BRINGS DOWN THE ENTIRE EMPIRE: CORPORATE ROYALTY MAY KEEP THE BLOODLINE STRONG, BUT IT CAN POSE A REAL THREAT TO THE REST OF US

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/idiot-heir-brings-down-entire-140000978.html

    88.46% Shortened!

    Most public companies have a single-class stock structure, meaning one stock equals one vote

    This empowers corporate executives to benefit from public investment in their company while maintaining perpetual control and limiting the investor’s power

    Alphabet subsidiary Google is the most famous example of a company with a dual-class structure

    In such a case, the public shareholders of the firm would vote on whether or not to extend the dual class structure, and if they declined it, all shares would be converted into a single class of shares with one vote per share

    Especially in the early days of a company, a dual-class structure can allow visionary leaders to steer the growth of the business

    So as a prospective investor, how do you know if an exciting dual-share company is just one generation away from flushing it all down the toilet? That’s the rub

    ['share', 'control', 'company', 'dual', 'class']

    Most public companies have a single-class stock structure, meaning one stock equals one vote

    This empowers corporate executives to benefit from public investment in their company while maintaining perpetual control and limiting the investor’s power

    Alphabet subsidiary Google is the most famous example of a company with a dual-class structure

    In such a case, the public shareholders of the firm would vote on whether or not to extend the dual class structure, and if they declined it, all shares would be converted into a single class of shares with one vote per share

    Especially in the early days of a company, a dual-class structure can allow visionary leaders to steer the growth of the business

    So as a prospective investor, how do you know if an exciting dual-share company is just one generation away from flushing it all down the toilet? That’s the rub

    ['share', 'control', 'company', 'dual', 'class']

    That’s the tax rise Tory MPs are now targeting

    “And on top of that,” says Steve, “corporation tax is going up, if ministers are stupid enough to do it – just as our energy costs rise even more.” Corporation tax is payable on profits above £50,000, with the full rate paid above £250,000

    If corporation tax was frozen in April, far from rebelling – as they did under Truss in September – I reckon financial markets would cheer

    The great thing about freezing a tax that’s been expected to rise, is that it feels like a tax cut

  • SNICKERS MAKER FINED AFTER WORKERS FALL INTO VAT OF CHOCOLATE

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/snickers-maker-fined-workers-fall-090613218.html

    50.0% Shortened!

    Snickers and M&M’s maker Mars Wrigley has been fined by US safety regulators after two workers at one of its factories fell into a vat of chocolate

    The confectionary factory in Pennsylvania was fined more than $14,500 (£12,000) by the Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) over the incident in June last year

    Officials said two contractors fell into the partially filled chocolate tank while carrying out maintenance work

    The contractors found themselves in a sticky situation while working on a batching tank, which is used to mix ingredients for chocolate

    The tank was filled waist-high with chocolate to make Dove, a brand sold in the US that is labelled Galaxy in the UK and elsewhere

    The factory in Elizabethtown also produces chocolate for M&Ms

    ['safety', 'two', 'worker', 'factory', 'chocolate']

  • HOW TO LEGALLY AVOID PAYING SALES TAXES ON A USED CAR

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/legal-way-avoid-paying-sales-130033476.html

    86.96% Shortened!

    How Much Is Sales Tax on a Used Car? Before we talk about how to avoid sales tax on a used car, let’s put sales tax into perspective

    If you spend $20,000 on a used car, you’re paying $1,900 in sales tax

    $20,000 on a car there results in $1,200 sales tax

    Why Buying a Car in Another State Doesn’t Work You may think you can avoid sales tax by just buying a car in a state that doesn’t charge sales tax, but it doesn’t work that way

    When you buy the car, you won’t pay the sales tax

    It’s legal to set up an LLC in Montana to buy a car in Montana, but what you do with that car in your state is up to your state

    ['sale', 'tax', 'car', 'use', 'avoid']

    $20,000 on a car there results in $1,200 sales tax

    Bab al-Hawa is the only point for international aid to reach people in rebel-held areas of Syria after nearly 12 years of civil war after other crossings were closed under pressure from China and Russia

    An Israeli emergency relief organisation said Sunday it had suspended its earthquake rescue operation in Türkiye and returned home because of a "significant" security threat to its staff

    Officials and medics said 29,605 people had died in Türkiye and 3,581 in Syria from last Monday's 7.8-magnitude quake, bringing the confirmed total to 33,186.

  • INDONESIA AND CHINA AGREE US$1.2BIL COST OVERRUN FOR HIGH-SPEED TRAIN, SAYS OFFICIAL

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2023/02/13/indonesia-and-china-agree-us12bil-cost-overrun-for-high-speed-train-says-official

    02/13/2023, 21:06

    57.14% Shortened!

    Monday, 13 Feb 2023

    The project was previously estimated to be US$2 billion over budget, raising the total cost to 113 trillion rupiah ($7.36 billion), according to the consortium of Indonesian and Chinese state companies building the railway, known as PT KCIC

    "We agreed on the cost overrun figure of US$1.2 billion

    Companies involved in the consortium were expected to increase their equity participation, while Indonesia's state-owned railway firm PT KAI, which along with state-owned construction company Wijaya Karya controls 60% of KCIC, received a 3.2 trillion rupiah ($210.66 million) capital injection from the government last month to help complete the project

    The project is expected to be completed in June 2023

    The other thing is that nobody in LaLiga has won the ball in the rival's half more than Pedri (42)

    Reading (3 p.m.) Before Sunday's 1-0 win, Barcelona hadn't "lost" the overall ball possession to any team

    Instead, Xavi was all about attitude, mentality and about what to do when Barcelona don't have the ball

    ['barcelona', 'xavi', 'united', 'team', 'time']

    LaLiga stats show that Xavi's team pass the ball around only seven times each time they are in possession

    Xavi might call it version 2.0

    pass the ball," Xavi's era is a lot more about "Take the ball ..

    The other thing is that nobody in LaLiga has won the ball in the rival's half more than Pedri (42)

    "Since the general election (in) 2004, only now have we have this much majority,” he said

    During his Royal Address in Parliament today, Sultan Abdullah welcomed the consensus reached by the unity government, which is in line with His Majesty's desire to form a stable and strong government

    His Majesty also congratulated Anwar for being appointed as the 10th Prime Minister and the Cabinet members of the unity government on their appointment, in addition to urging all parties to open their hearts and accept and respect the results of the 15th General Election

  • DR NOOR HISHAM: SALE OF TWO COSMETIC CREAMS BANNED, FOUND TO CONTAIN MERCURY

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/13/dr-noor-hisham-sale-of-two-cosmetic-creams-banned-found-to-contain-mercury

    02/13/2023

    57.14% Shortened!

    "Mercury is prohibited in cosmetic products because it can be harmful to health

    Dr Noor Hisham said the sale and distribution of those cosmetic products must be stopped immediately as they violate the Control of Drugs and Cosmetics Regulations 1984

    A company found guilty can be fined up to RM50,000 for the first offence and up to RM100,000 for subsequent offences

    "Members of the public who are currently using these cosmetic products are advised to immediately stop using them and seek advice from health professionals if they experience any discomfort or adverse effects," he said

    The public is also encouraged to check the notification status of cosmetic products by visiting the National Pharmaceutical Regulatory Agency (NPRA) official website www.npra.gov.my or through the 'NPRA Product Status' application which can be downloaded from the Google Play Store

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['cosmetic', 'product', 'mercury', 'say', 'health']

    ACP Cha said the suspect had been handed over to the Subang Jaya police for investigations into robberies there

  • MYJPJ APP: HERE’S HOW TO DIGITALISE YOUR ROAD TAX AND DRIVER’S LICENCE

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/13/myjpj-app-heres-how-to-digitalise-your-road-tax-and-drivers-licence/54751

    02/13/2023, 18:07

    62.5% Shortened!

    Instead, you can now use your smartphone and get a digital copy of your driver’s licence and the road tax for your vehicle

    Instead, simply tap on your profile on the bottom right of the screen, and you should see an option to show both your digital driving licence as well as digital road tax for your car

    It should be noted though that it’s not mandatory to switch over to the MyJPJ app yet so you don’t need to rip your road tax off your windshield just yet

    As mentioned by Loke, you can still use the physical road tax and bring your physical driving licence with you for now if you’re not ready to make the switch

    The digital road tax and driver’s licence meanwhile is just an additional option for motorists at the time being

    Motorists with learners driver’s licence, a vocational driver’s licence and foreigners with a Malaysian driver’s licence or foreign driver’s licence still need their physical driver’s licence too
